attributes.action: Prioritize the Queen and serving Mp's for the Covid 19 vaccination.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that it is our public duty to protect and support all those in authority during this period which has been rightfully designated as a war by our Prime Minister.
We further believe that to ban those wealthy individuals who have created the wealth in our society from purchasing a vaccine is a rejection of their human rights and an insult to democracy.
attributes.background: We believe that Her Royal Majesty and the serving members of our Parliament, House of Lords and senior civil servants should be given the utmost protection during this time of uncertainty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560861
